appliedGuidelines.reason: Incorporated priorities order and security emphasis consistent with project guidelines.
Updated Java version to 16 as per project guidelines.
Revised access modifiers guideline to prefer public by default, minimizing private, matching project guidelines.
Updated design patterns guideline to aggressively apply Factory, Builder, Strategy, Observer as per project guidelines.
Changed encapsulation guideline to keep implementation details public and avoid helper methods, per project guidelines.
Spring Boot version noted in project guidelines but not applicable to this language-level file; acknowledged but no direct change.
Configuration preference for properties over YAML noted in project guidelines; referenced in project but no direct YAML mention in tech stack file.
Repository pattern preference for SQL prepared statements noted; tech stack file references repository layer but does not contradict.

unappliedGuidelines.reason: Spring Boot version guideline is framework-specific and not applicable to core Java language instruction file.
Configuration guideline prefers properties over YAML; tech stack instruction uses application.yml but does not contradict; no direct YAML removal applied.
Repository pattern guideline prefers SQL prepared statements over Spring Data JPA; tech stack instruction mentions repository layer but does not specify repository implementation; no contradiction.
